caption.p: Comparisons of ecological niche models of Aedes albopictus in México. The relationships between the Pech-May et al. [ 9] ecological niche model and the 2020 ecological niche model. The green areas represent the areas where congruent predictions occurred between the two models, the red color represents the areas where Aedes albopictus is anticipated to occur by the Pech-May et al. [ 9] ENM only, and blue color represents the areas where Ae. albopictus is anticipated by the 2020 ENM only. The square at the bottom left corner of the map presents a close-up map showing the relationship between some of 2015–2020 occurrences and the Pech-May et al. [ 9] prediction.
